Uses of Class
org.mcm.sws.pddl.Formula

Packages that use Formula
org.mcm.sws The WSplan Semantic Web Service toolset.  
org.mcm.sws.annotation Provides for classes that capture the information of SESMA web service annotations. 
org.mcm.sws.pddl Provides for a PDDL parser and for various classes that capture the information of PDDL formulas.

abstract  Formula Formula.cloneAndSubstitute(java.util.Map bindings)
          replicate the formula (clone it and all sub-objects) and substitute the variables by values given in the map.
